Caress Brazilian Gardenia & Coconut Milk was previously known as Caress Pure Embrace
body.description: Want to feel irresistible every day? Revel in the feeling of soft silky skin with Caress Brazilian Gardenia & Coconut Milk beauty bar. Indulge yourself in this bath soap bar's luxurious lather, composed by the world’s best perfume experts. Cleanse your skin with the lush lather and rich nourishment of our Brazilian Gardenia & Coconut Milk Beauty Bar for a sweet start to your day. Caress Brazilian Gardenia & Coconut Milk is an indulgent and pampering beauty bar that blends rich, luxurious lather with expertly crafted fine fragrance. It is the bath soap that gently cleanses your skin to leave it delicately fragrant, beautifully soft. Make your daily shower one to remember as you delight in the fine fragrance of white flowers and enjoy the lavish lather of Caress Brazilian Gardenia & Coconut Milk scented soap. Indulge in this exquisite combination of fragrance and softness meant to wrap you in a soft embrace that delivers irresistibly silky and exquisitely perfumed skin. Caress body wash and bar soap fragrances are crafted by the world’s best perfumers to transform your daily shower into an indulging experience that will make you feel special every day. Caress Brazilian Gardenia & Coconut Milk was previously known as Caress Pure Embrace.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Pure Embrace Beauty Bar At a Glance: Beauty bar infused with white flower extracts and almond oil Elegant fragrance crafted by expert perfumers Rich lather creates a luxurious cleansing experience Leaves skin feeling soft and smooth Perfume lingers for fragrant skin Caress Pure Embrace Beauty Bar With White Flowers & Almond Oil Caress Pure Embrace Beauty Bar brings luxury to every bathing experience with a scent designed by expert perfumers that is infused with white flower and almond oil extracts for an elegant fragrance. Pure Embrace Beauty Bar builds to a rich lather when worked into a pouf or onto the skin, allowing you to feel indulgent in the shower or bath. After rinsing clean, this beauty bar will leave your skin feeling smooth and looking soft, while the light, pleasing scent of Pure Embrace lingers throughout the day. Make your everyday shower something to look forward to with Pure Embrace Beauty Bar by Caress. What's in the Box: Caress Pure Embrace Beauty Bar, 3.15 Ounces, 3 Bars.

Luxury for Your Daily Routine Treat yourself to a more sophisticated and soothing daily shower or bath with Caress Pure Embrace Beauty Bar. The delicate scent and foamy lather of Pure Embrace make it easy to feel indulgent at the start or end of a busy day. Designed by Expert Perfumers The expert perfumers at Caress Extracts have designed the scent of this beauty bar from a variety of sweet and complex white flowers balanced perfectly with natural almond oil extracts. Years of experience in fragrance design help these perfumers craft captivating and therapeutic scents for this and many other Caress products. Leaves Your Skin Feeling Soft and Pampered Work Pure Embrace Beauty Bar into a pouf or washcloth and create a rich, creamy lather that will leave your skin feeling clean and smooth. Rinse and face the day with a hint of elegant fragrance and soft, pampered skin.

The Caress Way As with all their bath and beauty products, Caress Pure Embrace Beauty Bar leaves your skin feeling luxurious with a hint of alluring fragrance. Developed by experts at the top fine fragrance houses of Givaudan and Firmenich, each Caress product is crafted with sophisticated, multilayered notes that linger on the skin and delight the senses.
